process.description: TCP4-2298 Check the functionality of Intermediate Event with nested screen tasks
process.name: TCP4-2298 Check the functionality of Intermediate Event with nested screen tasks
process.bpmn:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<bpmn:definitions xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:bpmn="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL" xmlns:bpmndi="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/DI" xmlns:dc="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DC" xmlns:di="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DI" xmlns:pm="http://processmaker.com/BPMN/2.0/Schema.xsd" xmlns:tns="http://sourceforge.net/bpmn/definitions/_1530553328908" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" targetNamespace="http://bpmn.io/schema/bpmn" exporter="ProcessMaker Modeler" exporterVersion="1.0" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL http://bpmn.sourceforge.net/schemas/BPMN20.xsd">
  <bpmn:process id="ProcessId" name="ProcessName" isExecutable="true">
    <bpmn:startEvent id="node_1" name="Start Event" pm:allowInterstitial="false" pm:config="{"web_entry":null}">
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_41</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:startEvent>
    <bpmn:intermediateCatchEvent id="node_2" name="Intermediate Timer Event">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_22</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_29</bpmn:outgoing>
      <bpmn:timerEventDefinition>
        <bpmn:timeDuration>PT1M</bpmn:timeDuration>
      </bpmn:timerEventDefinition>
    </bpmn:intermediateCatchEvent>
    <bpmn:task id="node_3" name="Form Task 1" pm:screenRef="472" pm:allowInterstitial="false" pm:assignment="requester" pm:assignmentLock="false" pm:allowReassignment="false" pm:config="{"reactions":false,"voting":false,"edit_comments":false,"remove_comments":false,"web_entry":null,"email_notifications":{"notifications":[]}}">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_41</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_11</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:task>
    <bpmn:intermediateThrowEvent id="node_7" name="Intermediate Message Throw Event">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_16</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_25</bpmn:outgoing>
      <bpmn:messageEventDefinition messageRef="node_7_message"/>
    </bpmn:intermediateThrowEvent>
    <bpmn:intermediateCatchEvent id="node_9" name="Intermediate Conditional Catch Event">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_18</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_23</bpmn:outgoing>
      <bpmn:conditionalEventDefinition>
        <bpmn:condition xsi:type="bpmn:tFormalExpression">form_input_1== 'test_2298'</bpmn:condition>
      </bpmn:conditionalEventDefinition>
    </bpmn:intermediateCatchEvent>
    <bpmn:task id="node_10" name="Form Task 2" pm:screenRef="472" pm:allowInterstitial="false" pm:assignment="requester" pm:assignmentLock="false" pm:allowReassignment="false" pm:config="{"reactions":false,"voting":false,"edit_comments":false,"remove_comments":false,"web_entry":null,"email_notifications":{"notifications":[]}}">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_20</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_35</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:task>
    <bpmn:callActivity id="node_12" name="test Case" pm:config="{"email":"automation@endtest-mail.io","subject":"FOR Test case","keyName":"yes ","options":[{"content":"yes","value":"yes","buttonVariant":"btn-primary"},{"content":"no","value":"no","buttonVariant":"btn-primary"}],"screenRef":"","body":"Verify TEST CASE","type":"","bodyType":"text","emailServer":"","template":"welcome"}">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_23</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_39</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:callActivity>
    <bpmn:serviceTask id="node_13" name="PDF Generator" pm:config="{"screenRef":475,"fileName":"ForTestCase"}" implementation="connector-pdf-print/processmaker-communication-pdf-print">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_29</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_33</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:serviceTask>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_23" name="" sourceRef="node_9" targetRef="node_12"/>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_29" name="" sourceRef="node_2" targetRef="node_13"/>
    <bpmn:manualTask id="node_30" name="Manual Task" pm:screenRef="475" pm:allowInterstitial="false" pm:assignment="requester" pm:assignmentLock="false" pm:allowReassignment="false" pm:config="{"reactions":false,"voting":false,"edit_comments":false,"remove_comments":false}">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_25</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_37</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:manualTask>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_25" name="" sourceRef="node_7" targetRef="node_30"/>
    <bpmn:endEvent id="node_31" name="End Event">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_33</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:incoming>node_35</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:incoming>node_37</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:incoming>node_39</bpmn:incoming>
    </bpmn:endEvent>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_33" name="" sourceRef="node_13" targetRef="node_31"/>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_35" name="" sourceRef="node_10" targetRef="node_31"/>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_37" name="" sourceRef="node_30" targetRef="node_31"/>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_39" name="" sourceRef="node_12" targetRef="node_31"/>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_41" name="" sourceRef="node_1" targetRef="node_3"/>
    <bpmn:parallelGateway id="node_14" name="Parallel Gateway" gatewayDirection="Diverging">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_11</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_16</bpmn:outgoing>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_18</bpmn:outgoing>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_20</bpmn:outgoing>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_22</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:parallelGateway>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_11" name="" sourceRef="node_3" targetRef="node_14"/>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_16" name="" sourceRef="node_14" targetRef="node_7"/>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_18" name="" sourceRef="node_14" targetRef="node_9"/>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_20" name="" sourceRef="node_14" targetRef="node_10"/>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_22" name="" sourceRef="node_14" targetRef="node_2"/>
  </bpmn:process>
  <bpmn:message id="node_7_message" name="node_7_message"/>
  <bpmn:signal id="A" name="A"/>
  <bpmndi:BPMNDiagram id="BPMNDiagramId">
    <bpmndi:BPMNPlane id="BPMNPlaneId" bpmnElement="ProcessId">
